dt-option.name: language.autoFill.cancel

type.description: The message to display for the cancel option in the multi-fill selector panel.

dt-option.description: If the multi-fill selector is shown it will always contain a cancel option that the end user can select to have no update performed on the table. This option provides the ability to customise the cancel message shown in the selector.

example.title: Set a fill type information message
